The applicant must be attached to at least one requisition or pool.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is the responsibility of the Recruiter to create an Offer in Staffing Desk for each applicant who has reached the offer process stage of the hiring process. Offers in status “Draft” are not considered as active and valid.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Offer Approver set in the offer is responsible to make a decision if the offer can be made to the applicant. The Approver communicates their decision by choosing either “Approve” or “Reject” option in Staffing Desk.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HR will review The Hiring Compliance section of the Offer when the offer has been approved.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once the offer is approved in Staffing Desk, and HR has completed review of the Hiring Compliance, the Recruiter may extend the offer letter to the applicant.
